attributes.action: Start theory and driving tests from the 8th of March 2021
attributes.background: As all other forms of education are going back to normal I think it is important for all learner drivers to have the chance to take their tests, this is also unfair as taxi drivers are allowed to open which is more dangerous than taking these tests where you can wear all PPE

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Restart driving tests immediately from April 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576966

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
